translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

It is not appropriate to remove a single item from the National Estates, formerly of the extinct Jesuits in the Missions, thus I communicate this to Your Lordship José Antônio da Silva, which should be confiscated in cattle of enemy property.

God keep Your Lordship  
Secretary of the Treasury in Piratini, July 26, 1838.  
(a) Domingos José de Almeida.

Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima — General Commander of the Police of the Municipality and Frontier of Alegrete.
